Methods in com.googlecode.transmuter.converter that throw ObjectInstantiationException

          Creates a new converter type extracting the information from a method object and it's owner type.

          Creates a new ConverterType extracting the information from a given instance and a method object.
protected  void Binding.initialize(Object instance, Method method)
          Called only in the constructors, this method attempts to validate the given arguments and populate this instance's fields, throwing an exception if the arguments are not deemed valid.
